short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily organize prompts that can be accessed in any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crafting prompts can be a challenging and time-consuming task, often requiring multiple iterations to achieve the desired outcome. However, with the introduction of PromptsEverywhere, this process becomes significantly more efficient and user-friendly. PromptsEverywhere offers instant access to a vast collection of inspiring prompts directly from your preferred websites, including popular platforms like Pika Labs, ChatGPT, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion.

Effortless Activation
Activate PromptsEverywhere with a simple keystroke. Just type "p/" in the input bar of your preferred tool, and you're instantly connected to a world of creative possibilities. The vast repository of prompts is designed to spark your imagination and help you find the perfect starting point for your projects.
